item.description:

item.title: Sports court east gate cannot be closed, 7th November
item.description:
The latch to this gate is bent, so the gate can't be closed all the way. Because it can't be closed, dogs frequently come in to the sports court while children are playing and disrupt their games.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queen Elizabeths Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
